summary: TODAY I NOTICED THAT THE TRIM ON MY WINDSHIELD WAS CRACKED, BROKEN AND FALLING OFF. MY CAR HAS ABOUT 40K MILES ON IT AND WOULD NOT HAVE EXPECTED THIS TO FALL APART ALREADY. THIS PAST YEAR I MAY HAVE DRIVEN MY CAR 5000 MILES.  IT HAS NOT BEEN IN ANY STORMS OR EIGHT WIND SITUATIONS. I HAVE BEEN HEARING A STRANGE NOISE IN THE FRONT BUT DID NOT CONNECT THIS TO A TRIM MOLDING ISSUE.  IT IS DANGEROUS BECAUSE IT COULD FLY OFF AND HIT A PEDESTRIAN,MOTORCYCLE RIDER OR BICYCLE RIDER OR EVEN ANOTHER VEHICLE.
